                    Name ="cbFindStudent"
                    RowSourceType ="Table/Query"
                    RowSource ="SELECT Protocols.PROTOID, [LNAME] & \", \" & [FNAME] & \" \" & [MI] & \" \" & [S"
                        "ALUTATION] & \" (\" & [TP] & \")\" AS Name FROM Persons RIGHT JOIN (Protocols LE"
                        "FT JOIN Students ON Protocols.STID=Students.STID) ON Persons.PID=Students.PID OR"
                        "DER BY [LNAME] & \", \" & [FNAME] & \" \" & [MI] & \" \" & [SALUTATION] & \" (\""
                        " & [TP] & \")\"; "
                    ColumnWidths ="0;2160"
                    AfterUpdate ="[Event Procedure]"
                    OnEnter ="[Event Procedure]"
                    BaseInfo ="\"SELECT Protocols.PROTOID, [LNAME] & \"\", \"\" & [FNAME] & \"\" \"\" & [MI] & "
                        "\"\" \"\" & [SALUTATION] & \"\" (\"\" & [TP] & \"\")\"\" AS Name FROM Persons RI"
                        "GHT JOIN (Protocols LEFT JOIN Students ON Protocols.STID=Students.STID) ON Perso"
                        "ns.PID=Students.PID ORDER BY [LNAME] & \"\", \"\" & [FNAME] & \"\" \"\" & [MI] &"
                        " \"\" \"\" & [SALUTATION] & \"\" (\"\" & [TP] & \"\")\"\"; \";\"Persons\";\"Prot"
                        "ocols\";\"Students\";\"\""

                    OnNotInList ="[Event Procedure]"
                    BaseInfo ="\"SELECT Students.STID, [LNAME] & \"\", \"\" & [FNAME] & \"\" \"\" & [MI] & \"\""
                        " \"\" & [SALUTATION] & \"\" (\"\" & [TP] & \"\")\"\" AS Name FROM Persons RIGHT "
                        "JOIN Students ON Persons.PID=Students.PID ORDER BY [LNAME] & \"\", \"\" & [FNAME"
                        "] & \"\" \"\" & [MI] & \"\" \"\" & [SALUTATION] & \"\" (\"\" & [TP] & \"\")\"\";"
                        " \";\"Persons\";\"Students\";\"\""

                    Begin
                        Begin Label
                            OverlapFlags =247
                            Left =360
                            Top =2460
                            Width =1170
                            Height =240
                            Name ="Label57"
                            Caption ="Student3 Team"

                                0xa3b4882eb585a64ab862cdb41f546b75
                            End
                        End

CodeBehindForm
Attribute VB_GlobalNameSpace = False
Attribute VB_Creatable = True
Attribute VB_PredeclaredId = True
Attribute VB_Exposed = False
'    SciFairMaster.mdb  (All class objects and modules)
'
'    Copyright (C) 2001,2002,2003,2004,2005,2006,2007,2008,2009,2010,2011,2012,2013,
'                  2014  Dennis e.Spanogle
'
'    This program is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify
'    it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by
'    the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or
'    (at your option) any later version.
'
'    This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
'    but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
'    MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.  See the
'    GNU General Public License for more details.
'
'    You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License
'    along with this program.  If not, see <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>.
Option Compare Database
Option Explicit
Private StudentsRS As Recordset
Private HoldCRCState As Boolean ' current state of 'Confirm Record Change' option
Private TeachersRS As Recordset
Private personsRS As Recordset
Private ProtocolFormsRS As Recordset
Private ctlPrevFocus As Control
Private dbSciFair As Database
Private RptName As String
Private msg As String
Private Title As String
Private criteria As String
Private DidAdd As Boolean
Private DidDelete As Boolean
Private NewPID As Long
Private NewSTID As Long
Private NewTID As Long
Private tempTP As String
Private tempPCID As Long
Private tempSTID As Long ' hold stid for main (1st) student to delete
Private tempLN As String
Private tempFN As String
Private tempSTID2 As Long ' hold stid for 2nd student if any to delete
Private tempTP2 As String
Private tempFN2 As String
Private tempLN2 As String
Private tempSTID3 As Long ' hold stid for 3rd student if any to delete
Private tempTP3 As String
Private tempFN3 As String
Private tempLN3 As String
 
Private Sub btnNewProto_Click()
    On Error GoTo SubError
    DoCmd.GoToRecord , , acNewRec
    cbStudent.SetFocus
    Exit Sub
SubError:
    MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub btnPrintForm_Click()
  On Error GoTo SubError
  If IsNull(Me!PRONUM) Then
    MsgBox "You must enter a 'Proto Type'"
    Exit Sub
  End If
  Me.Refresh
  With ProtocolFormsRS
    .FindFirst ("FORM_NUM = " & Val(Me!PRONUM))
    RptName = !Report  ' get the name of the form to open
    DoCmd.OpenReport RptName, , , "[PROTOID] = " & Me!PROTOID
    'DoCmd.PrintOut ' Open report does print
    DoCmd.Close acForm, RptName, acSaveNo
    Dim StatusStr As String
    StatusStr = IIf(IsNull(Me!STATUS), "", Me!STATUS)
    If (InStr(1, StatusStr, "LTR") > 0) Then '  do not replace if letter sent
      If MsgBox("Letter already printed!" & vbCrLf & _
             "Do you want to reset status to 'FRM'?", vbYesNo + vbDefaultButton2 _
             , Title) = vbYes Then
         Me!STATUS = "FRM"  ' Form Printed
      End If
    Else     '  there is not 'LTR' string in status - no letters printed
      Me!STATUS = "FRM"  ' Form Printed
    End If
  End With
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub btnPrintLetter_Click()
  On Error GoTo SubError
  If IsNull(Me!LTRSENT) Then
    MsgBox "You must enter a 'Letter Type'"
    Exit Sub
  End If
  ' Set the date letter sent (used on letter)
  ' Well I know it stinks - It assumes the printer works so.. see suberror
  Me.LTRDATE = Format(Now, "mm/dd/yy")
  Me.STATUS = "LTR" & Me!LTRSENT   ' Letter + num
  Me.Refresh
  With ProtocolFormsRS
    .FindFirst ("FORM_NUM = " & Val(Me!LTRSENT))
    RptName = !Report  ' get the name of the form to open
    DoCmd.OpenReport RptName, , , "PROTOID = " & Me!PROTOID
    DoCmd.Close acForm, RptName, acSaveNo
  End With
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  Me.LTRDATE = Null
  Me.STATUS = "FRM"
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub cbFindStudent_Enter()
   On Error GoTo SubError
   If DidDelete = True Then
     Me.cbFindStudent.Requery
     DidDelete = False
   End If
   If DidAdd = True Then
     Me.cbFindStudent.Requery
     DidAdd = False
   End If
   Exit Sub
SubError:
   MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub cbFindStudent_AfterUpdate()
    Dim rs As Object
    On Error GoTo SubError
    If (IsNull(cbFindStudent)) Then
       MsgBox "Nothing Selected!"
       cbFindStudent.SetFocus
       Exit Sub
    End If
    Set rs = Me.Recordset.Clone
    rs.FindFirst "[PROTOID] = " & Format(Me![cbFindStudent]) & " "
    Me.Bookmark = rs.Bookmark
    Me.cbFindStudent = Null
    Me.cbLTRSENT.SetFocus
    Exit Sub
SubError:
    MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub cbPRONUM_AfterUpdate()
   If IsNull(Me!STATUS) Then
      Me!STATUS = "NEW"  ' New Form
   Else
   
   End If
End Sub
Private Sub cbSchool_BeforeUpdate(Cancel As Integer)
   On Error GoTo SubError
   If Not Me.NewRecord Then
     msg = "Do you Really Want to " & vbCrLf & _
           "CHANGE THE SCHOOL?"
     If MsgBox(msg, vbYesNo + vbDefaultButton2, Title) = vbNo Then
       'cbTeacher.Value = cbTeacher.OldValue
       Me.SCH_CODE = Me.cbSchool.OldValue
       Cancel = True
     End If
   End If
   Exit Sub
SubError:
   MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub cbStudent_AfterUpdate()
   On Error GoTo SubError
   'Note: if last_fair is set (prev yr) do not change in case only does
   '      a protocol and does not enter as exhibit - last_fair remains actual last fair.
   If IsNull(Me.S1LstFr) Or Me.S1LstFr = "" Or Len(Me.S1LstFr) <> 4 Then
     Me.S1LstFr = FairYear()
   End If
   If Me.NewRecord = True Then
      Me!NDATE = Format(Now, "mm/dd/yy")
      Me!STATUS = "NEW"
   End If
   Exit Sub
SubError:
   MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub cbStudent_BeforeUpdate(Cancel As Integer)
' New code rev 213
'   ' this routine not called if notinlist response is acDataErrContinue
'   ' I.E. if added a new name with ; or if fixname (changed string)
'   ' User selected existing Person for a New record (only way to get here)
'   ' The person selected could already be a Student etc.  This would not be
'   ' a good thing so I will not allow it.
'   On Error GoTo suberror
'   ' Find the record that matches the new PID
'   Dim rs As Object
'   Set rs = Me.Recordset.Clone
'   rs.FindFirst "[PID] = " & cbPerson.Value 'contains the PID of seleced person
'   If rs.NoMatch Then
'      ' Find just continue
'   Else
'      MsgBox "Already a Judge!" & vbCrLf & _
'             "Select a different Person", vbOKOnly, Title
'      Cancel = True
'      Exit Sub
'   End If
  
  
  Dim rs As Object
  Dim rs1 As Recordset
  On Error GoTo SubError
  ' See if the student selected is already in the Protocols Table.
  If IsNull(cbStudent.Value) Then Exit Sub
  Set rs = Me.Recordset.Clone
  rs.FindFirst "[STID] = " & cbStudent.Value
  If rs.NoMatch Then Exit Sub
  ' Wops, this STID is already in Protocols  so do warning
  msg = "The student you entered is already in Protocols" & vbCrLf & _
    "as 'Student' (first student on form)" & vbCrLf & _
    "Duplicate Protocols is a problem!  Research the problem!" & vbCrLf & _
    "Either Delete the existing entry then enter the new one or.." & vbCrLf & _
    "Edit the existing entry to match the new paperwork!"
  MsgBox msg
  Cancel = True
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub cbStudent_NotInList(newdata As String, Response As Integer)
   On Error GoTo SubError
   Dim Name As String
   Dim ln As String
   Dim FN As String
   Dim min As String
   Dim SAL As String
   Dim rtn As Boolean
'  New code rev 213
   Dim FixedName As Boolean
   Name = newdata   'lastname, firstname, mi, salutation'
   rtn = ParseName(Name, ln, FN, min, SAL, FixedName)
   If rtn = False Then      ' did not parse so exit
       MsgBox "Bad Name, ReEnter!"
       Response = acDataErrContinue
       Exit Sub
   Else  ' have names so create a new record
'  New code rev 213
     msg = SAL & " " & FN & " " & min & " " & ln & vbCrLf & vbCrLf & _
           "ENTER a NEW Person?"
     If MsgBox(msg, vbYesNo, Title) = vbYes Then
       ' returns false if error, else true with NewPid = 0 if no dups, else pid
       ' of selected person to use instead of the the one typed
       If SearchDuplicatePersons(ln, FN, min, SAL, "Students", NewPID) = False Then
         Response = acDataErrContinue
         Exit Sub
       End If
       With StudentsRS
          .AddNew           ' entering a student record AND a new person
          If NewPID = 0 Then 'Entering data in these fields creates new PID
                            ' and puts it in Student.PID field
            !LNAME = IIf(ln = "", Null, ln)
            !FNAME = IIf(FN = "", Null, FN)
            !MI = IIf(min = "", Null, min)
            !SALUTATION = IIf(SAL = "", Null, SAL)
            !TP = "PS"   ' Protocol student
            ' next entry is actually in Students table so sets STID
            ' it is required to put something in table to set STID
            !Temp = "t"  ' <----- STUDENT TEMP
             NewSTID = !STID
            .Update   ' ---------------------------- ADD NEW STUDENT RECORD
          Else ' Have an existing Person but not yet a student
            !PID = NewPID  ' this just links in the selected Person
                          ' to the new student record thus avoiding dups
                           ' and fills in LNAME, FNAME, TP, LAST_CHG etc.
            NewSTID = !STID
            .Update   ' ---------------------------- ADD NEW STUDENT RECORD
            .MoveFirst    ' go to the new record!
            .FindFirst "STID = " & NewSTID
            .Edit  ' Add  PS (protocol student) to persons type field
              ' We get here if user selects and existing person that
              ' was not a student (i.e. typed name of an existing judge)
            tempTP = IIf(IsNull(!TP), "", !TP)
            Call setFieldTP(tempTP, "PS")
            !TP = tempTP
            .Update
          End If
          .MoveFirst    ' go to the new record!
          .FindFirst "STID = " & NewSTID
          .Edit
          !Temp = "PCol " & Format(Now, "mm/yy")  ' <----- STUDENT TEMP
   'Note: if last_fair is set (prev yr) do not change in case only does
   '      a protocol and does not enter as exhibit - last_fair remains actual last fair.
          If IsNull(!LAST_FAIR) Then
            !LAST_FAIR = FairYear()
          End If
          !LAST_CHG = Format(Now, "mm/dd/yy")     ' < ----- Persons LAST_CHG --
          .Update
          Me.cbStudent.Value = !STID
       End With
       Me.cbStudent.Requery ' Put new student in the cbox to find protocol student
'  New code rev 213
       If FixedName = True Or NewPID > 0 Or InStr(1, newdata, ";") > 0 Then
          ' If I set Response = acDataErrAdded in this case, (forced a new record)
          ' combobox .value and me.STID(or TID etc) are reset to the value
          ' that was selected in the combobox prior to me forcing a new STID or TID.
          ' I think the acdataerrAdded puts this in there before it trys to
          ' exit the box..
          ' by settin Response = acDataErrContinue the new record is added,
          ' the correct record is selected in the combo box and the user just
          ' has to press enter or tab again or click somewhere else.
          ' perhaps the is a way to do this better but I know not this took two
          ' days to figure out!
         Response = acDataErrContinue
         Me.TimerInterval = 50   ' go do TAB after 50 msec
       Else  'new PID = 0 and other
          Response = acDataErrAdded
       End If
     Else  ' abort the process, user abort
       Response = acDataErrContinue
       Exit Sub
     End If  ' user response to add record
   End If 'parsename rtn check
   
   Exit Sub
SubError:
   
   MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub cbStudent2_AfterUpdate()
   On Error GoTo SubError
   'Note: if last_fair is set (prev yr) do not change in case only does
   '      a protocol and does not enter as exhibit - last_fair remains actual last fair.
   If IsNull(Me.S2LstFr) Or Me.S2LstFr = "" Or Len(Me.S2LstFr) <> 4 Then
     Me.S2LstFr = FairYear()
   End If
   If Me.NewRecord = True Then
      Me!NDATE = Format(Now, "mm/dd/yy")
      Me!STATUS = "NEW"
   End If
  Exit Sub
SubError:
   MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub cbStudent2_BeforeUpdate(Cancel As Integer)
  Dim rs As Object
  Dim rs1 As Recordset
  On Error GoTo SubError
  ' See if the student selected is already in the Protocols Table.
  If IsNull(cbStudent2.Value) Then Exit Sub
  Set rs = Me.Recordset.Clone
  rs.FindFirst "[STID] = " & cbStudent2.Value
  If rs.NoMatch Then Exit Sub
  ' Wops, this STID is already in Protocols  so do warning
  msg = "The student you entered is already in Protocols" & vbCrLf & _
    "as 'Student' (first student on form)" & vbCrLf & _
    "Duplicate Protocols is a problem!  Research the problem!" & vbCrLf & _
    "Either Delete the existing entry then enter the new one or.." & vbCrLf & _
    "Edit the existing entry to match the new paperwork!"
  MsgBox msg
  Cancel = True
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub cbStudent2_NotInList(newdata As String, Response As Integer)
   On Error GoTo SubError
   Dim Name As String
   Dim ln As String
   Dim FN As String
   Dim min As String
   Dim SAL As String
   Dim rtn As Boolean
'  New code rev 213
   Dim FixedName As Boolean
   Name = newdata   'lastname, firstname, mi, salutation'
   rtn = ParseName(Name, ln, FN, min, SAL, FixedName)
   If rtn = False Then      ' did not parse so exit
       MsgBox "Bad Name, ReEnter!"
       Response = acDataErrContinue
       Exit Sub
   Else  ' have names so create a new record
'  New code rev 213
     msg = SAL & " " & FN & " " & min & " " & ln & vbCrLf & vbCrLf & _
           "ENTER a NEW Person?"
     If MsgBox(msg, vbYesNo, Title) = vbYes Then
       If SearchDuplicatePersons(ln, FN, min, SAL, "Students", NewPID) = False Then
         Response = acDataErrContinue
         Exit Sub
       End If
       With StudentsRS
          .AddNew           ' entering a student record
          If NewPID = 0 Then 'Entering data in these fields creates new PID
                            ' and puts it in Student.PID field
            !LNAME = IIf(ln = "", Null, ln)
            !FNAME = IIf(FN = "", Null, FN)
            !MI = IIf(min = "", Null, min)
            !SALUTATION = IIf(SAL = "", Null, SAL)
            !TP = "PS"   ' Protocol student
            ' next entry is actually in Students table so sets STID
            ' it is required to put something in table to set STID
            !Temp = "t"  ' <----- STUDENT TEMP
             NewSTID = !STID
            .Update   ' ---------------------------- ADD NEW STUDENT RECORD
          Else
            !PID = NewPID  ' this just links in the selected Person
                           ' to the new student record thus avoiding dups
                           ' and fills in LNAME, FNAME, TP, LAST_CHG etc.
            NewSTID = !STID
            .Update   ' ---------------------------- ADD NEW STUDENT RECORD
            .MoveFirst    ' go to the new record!
            .FindFirst "STID = " & NewSTID
            .Edit
            tempTP = IIf(IsNull(!TP), "", !TP)
            Call setFieldTP(tempTP, "PS")
            !TP = tempTP
            .Update
          End If
          .MoveFirst    ' go to the new record!
          .FindFirst "STID = " & NewSTID
          .Edit
          !Temp = "PCol " & Format(Now, "mm/yy")  ' <----- STUDENT TEMP
          !LAST_CHG = Format(Now, "mm/dd/yy")     ' < ----- Persons LAST_CHG --
   'Note: if last_fair is set (prev yr) do not change in case only does
   '      a protocol and does not enter as exhibit - last_fair remains actual last fair.
          If IsNull(!LAST_FAIR) Then
            !LAST_FAIR = FairYear()
          End If
          .Update
          Me.cbStudent2.Value = !STID
       End With
       Me.cbStudent2.Requery
'  New code rev 213
       If FixedName = True Or NewPID > 0 Or InStr(1, newdata, ";") > 0 Then
          ' If I set Response = acDataErrAdded in this case, (forced a new record)
          ' combobox .value and me.STID(or TID etc) are reset to the value
          ' that was selected in the combobox prior to me forcing a new STID or TID.
          ' I think the acdataerrAdded puts this in there before it trys to
          ' exit the box..
          ' by settin Response = acDataErrContinue the new record is added,
          ' the correct record is selected in the combo box and the user just
          ' has to press enter or tab again or click somewhere else.
          ' perhaps the is a way to do this better but I know not this took two
          ' days to figure out!
         Response = acDataErrContinue
         Me.TimerInterval = 50
       Else  'new PID = 0 and other
          Response = acDataErrAdded
       End If
     Else  ' abort the process, user abort
       Response = acDataErrContinue
       Exit Sub
     End If  ' user response to add record
   End If 'parsename rtn check
   Exit Sub
SubError:
   MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub cbStudent3_AfterUpdate()
   On Error GoTo SubError
   'Note: if last_fair is set (prev yr) do not change in case only does
   '      a protocol and does not enter as exhibit - last_fair remains actual last fair.
   If IsNull(Me.S3LstFr) Or Me.S3LstFr = "" Or Len(Me.S3LstFr) <> 4 Then
     Me.S3LstFr = FairYear()
   End If
   If Me.NewRecord = True Then
      Me!NDATE = Format(Now, "mm/dd/yy")
      Me!STATUS = "NEW"
   End If
   Exit Sub
SubError:
   MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub cbStudent3_BeforeUpdate(Cancel As Integer)
  Dim rs As Object
  Dim rs1 As Recordset
  On Error GoTo SubError
  ' See if the student selected is already in the Protocols Table.
  If IsNull(cbStudent3.Value) Then Exit Sub
  Set rs = Me.Recordset.Clone
  rs.FindFirst "[STID] = " & cbStudent3.Value
  If rs.NoMatch Then Exit Sub
  ' Wops, this STID is already in Protocols  so do warning
  msg = "The student you entered is already in Protocols" & vbCrLf & _
    "as 'Student' (first student on form)" & vbCrLf & _
    "Duplicate Protocols is a problem!  Research the problem!" & vbCrLf & _
    "Either Delete the existing entry then enter the new one or.." & vbCrLf & _
    "Edit the existing entry to match the new paperwork!"
  MsgBox msg
  Cancel = True
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub cbStudent3_NotInList(newdata As String, Response As Integer)
   On Error GoTo SubError
   Dim Name As String
   Dim ln As String
   Dim FN As String
   Dim min As String
   Dim SAL As String
   Dim rtn As Boolean
'  New code rev 213
   Dim FixedName As Boolean
   Name = newdata   'lastname, firstname, mi, salutation'
   rtn = ParseName(Name, ln, FN, min, SAL, FixedName)
   If rtn = False Then      ' did not parse so exit
       MsgBox "Bad Name, ReEnter!"
       Response = acDataErrContinue
       Exit Sub
   Else  ' have names so create a new record
     ' search if student is already entered.
'  New code rev 213
     msg = SAL & " " & FN & " " & min & " " & ln & vbCrLf & vbCrLf & _
           "ENTER a NEW Person?"
     If MsgBox(msg, vbYesNo, Title) = vbYes Then
       If SearchDuplicatePersons(ln, FN, min, SAL, "Students", NewPID) = False Then
         Response = acDataErrContinue
         Exit Sub
       End If
       With StudentsRS
          .AddNew           ' entering a student record
          If NewPID = 0 Then 'Entering data in these fields creates new PID
                            ' and puts it in Student.PID field
            !LNAME = IIf(ln = "", Null, ln)
            !FNAME = IIf(FN = "", Null, FN)
            !MI = IIf(min = "", Null, min)
            !SALUTATION = IIf(SAL = "", Null, SAL)
            !TP = "PS"   ' Protocol student
            ' next entry is actually in Students table so sets STID
            ' it is required to put something in table to set STID
            !Temp = "t"  ' <----- STUDENT TEMP
             NewSTID = !STID
            .Update   ' ---------------------------- ADD NEW STUDENT RECORD
          Else
            !PID = NewPID  ' this just links in the selected Person
                           ' to the new student record thus avoiding dups
                           ' and fills in LNAME, FNAME, TP, LAST_CHG etc.
            NewSTID = !STID
            .Update   ' ---------------------------- ADD NEW STUDENT RECORD
            .MoveFirst    ' go to the new record!
            .FindFirst "STID = " & NewSTID
            .Edit
            tempTP = IIf(IsNull(!TP), "", !TP)
            Call setFieldTP(tempTP, "PS")
            !TP = tempTP
            .Update
          End If
          .MoveFirst    ' go to the new record!
          .FindFirst "STID = " & NewSTID
          .Edit
          !Temp = "PCol " & Format(Now, "mm/yy")  ' <----- STUDENT TEMP
   'Note: if last_fair is set (prev yr) do not change in case only does
   '      a protocol and does not enter as exhibit - last_fair remains actual last fair.
          If IsNull(!LAST_FAIR) Then
            !LAST_FAIR = FairYear()
          End If
          !LAST_CHG = Format(Now, "mm/dd/yy")     ' < ----- Persons LAST_CHG --
          .Update
          Me.cbStudent3.Value = !STID
       End With
       Me.cbStudent3.Requery
'  New code rev 213
       If FixedName = True Or NewPID > 0 Or InStr(1, newdata, ";") > 0 Then
          ' If I set Response = acDataErrAdded in this case, (forced a new record)
          ' combobox .value and me.STID(or TID etc) are reset to the value
          ' that was selected in the combobox prior to me forcing a new STID or TID.
          ' I think the acdataerrAdded puts this in there before it trys to
          ' exit the box..
          ' by settin Response = acDataErrContinue the new record is added,
          ' the correct record is selected in the combo box and the user just
          ' has to press enter or tab again or click somewhere else.
          ' perhaps the is a way to do this better but I know not this took two
          ' days to figure out!
         Response = acDataErrContinue
         Me.TimerInterval = 50
       Else  'new PID = 0 and other
          Response = acDataErrAdded
       End If
     Else  ' abort the process, user abort
       Response = acDataErrContinue
       Exit Sub
     End If  ' user response to add record
   End If 'parsename rtn check
   Exit Sub
SubError:
   MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub

Private Sub cbTeacher_AfterUpdate()
   On Error GoTo SubError
   Exit Sub
SubError:
   MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub

Private Sub cbTeacher_BeforeUpdate(Cancel As Integer)
   On Error GoTo SubError
   If Not Me.NewRecord Then
     msg = "Do you Really Want to " & vbCrLf & _
           "CHANGE THE TEACHER?"
     If MsgBox(msg, vbYesNo + vbDefaultButton2, Title) = vbNo Then
       Me.TID = cbTeacher.OldValue
       Cancel = True
     End If
   End If
   Exit Sub
SubError:
   MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub cbTeacher_Enter()
  If IsNull(Me.SCH_CODE) Then
    MsgBox "Enter School First", vbOKOnly, Title
  End If
End Sub
Private Sub cbTeacher_NotInList(newdata As String, Response As Integer)
   On Error GoTo SubError
   Dim Name As String
   Dim ln As String
   Dim FN As String
   Dim min As String
   Dim SAL As String
   Dim rtn As Boolean
'  New code rev 213
   Dim FixedName As Boolean
   Name = newdata   'lastname, firstname, mi, salutation'
   rtn = ParseName(Name, ln, FN, min, SAL, FixedName)
   If rtn = False Then      ' did not parse so exit
       MsgBox "Bad Name, ReEnter!"
       Response = acDataErrContinue
       Exit Sub
   Else  ' have names so create a new record
'  New code rev 213
     msg = SAL & " " & FN & " " & min & " " & ln & vbCrLf & vbCrLf & _
           "ENTER a NEW Person?"
     If MsgBox(msg, vbYesNo, Title) = vbYes Then
       If SearchDuplicatePersons(ln, FN, min, SAL, "Teachers", NewPID) = False Then
         Response = acDataErrContinue
         Exit Sub
       End If
       With TeachersRS
          .AddNew           ' entering a student record
          If NewPID = 0 Then 'Entering data in these fields creates new PID
                            ' and puts it in Teacher.PID field
            !LNAME = IIf(ln = "", Null, ln)
            !FNAME = IIf(FN = "", Null, FN)
            !MI = IIf(min = "", Null, min)
            !SALUTATION = IIf(SAL = "", Null, SAL)
            !TP = "PT"   ' Protocol Teacher
            ' next entry is actually in Students table so sets STID
            ' it is required to put something in table to set STID
            !Temp = "t"  ' <----- Teacher TEMP
             NewTID = !TID
            .Update   ' ---------------------------- ADD NEW TEACHER RECORD
          Else
            !PID = NewPID  ' this just links in the selected Person
                           ' to the new teacher record thus avoiding dups
                           ' and fills in LNAME, FNAME, TP, LAST_CHG etc.
            NewTID = !TID
            .Update   ' ---------------------------- ADD NEW TEACHER RECORD
            .MoveFirst    ' go to the new record!
            .FindFirst "TID = " & NewTID
            .Edit
            tempTP = IIf(IsNull(!TP), "", !TP)
            Call setFieldTP(tempTP, "PT")  ' Set as Protocol teacher
            !TP = tempTP
            .Update
          End If
          .MoveFirst    ' go to the new record!
          .FindFirst "TID = " & NewTID
          .Edit
          !Temp = "PCol " & Format(Now, "mm/yy")  ' <----- Teacher TEMP
          !LAST_CHG = Format(Now, "mm/dd/yy")     '  <--- Persons LAST_CHG
          !SCH_CODE = Me.SCH_CODE   ' could be set to null if user not enter
                                   'school before Teacher.
          .Update
          Me.cbTeacher.Value = !TID
       End With
       Me.cbTeacher.Requery
'  New code rev 213
       If FixedName = True Or NewPID > 0 Or InStr(1, newdata, ";") > 0 Then
          ' If I set Response = acDataErrAdded in this case, (forced a new record)
          ' combobox .value and me.STID(or TID etc) are reset to the value
          ' that was selected in the combobox prior to me forcing a new STID or TID.
          ' I think the acdataerrAdded puts this in there before it trys to
          ' exit the box..
          ' by settin Response = acDataErrContinue the new record is added,
          ' the correct record is selected in the combo box and the user just
          ' has to press enter or tab again or click somewhere else.
          ' perhaps the is a way to do this better but I know not this took two
          ' days to figure out!
         Response = acDataErrContinue
         Me.TimerInterval = 50
       Else  'new PID = 0 and other
          Response = acDataErrAdded
       End If
     Else  ' abort the process, user abort
       Response = acDataErrContinue
       Exit Sub
     End If  ' user response to add record
   End If 'parsename rtn check
   Exit Sub
SubError:
   MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub

Private Sub Form_AfterDelConfirm(STATUS As Integer)
  On Error GoTo SubError
  Dim msg As String
  ' Log the deletion of the protocol
  Call ScifairLog("Del Protocol PCOLID: ", tempPCID, "1stStudent: " & tempLN & ", " & tempFN)
  ' Ask if Delete the main (1st) student (only if tp = PS i.e. new this year)
    If tempTP = "PS" Then  ' Never Delete Students with TP = ES From prev years
            ' Also Never Delete if have other types in TP field i.e 'PS,AD'
      If MsgBox("Delete Protocol Student  " & tempLN & ", " & tempFN & vbCrLf & _
                "   (From Protocol you just Deleted", _
         vbYesNo) = vbYes Then
         With StudentsRS  ' Students joined to Persons
           .FindFirst "STID = " & tempSTID
           If Not .NoMatch Then ' found it
            On Error Resume Next ' if student or person used elsewhere get error
            .Delete  ' Delete the student and the person if possible
            If Err.Number > 0 Then
           ' Will probably never get here - Unlikely have TP = PS only and used
           ' elsewhere unless some other use does not change or add another type to TP
           ' O well,  good practice learning how to use error trapping and continuing
              Err.Clear
              MsgBox "Can Not Delete - Used Elsewhere"
            Else
              Call ScifairLog("Del Proto 1st Student STID: ", tempSTID, tempLN & ", " & tempFN)
            End If
            On Error GoTo 0
            On Error GoTo SubError
          End If
        End With
      End If
    End If
  If tempSTID2 > 0 Then  ' check if delete 2nd student
    If tempTP2 = "PS" Then  ' Never Delete Students with TP = ES From prev years
            ' Also Never Delete if have other types in TP field i.e 'PS,AD'
      If MsgBox("Delete Protocol 2nd Student  " & tempLN2 & ", " & tempFN2 & vbCrLf & _
                "   (From Protocol you just Deleted", _
         vbYesNo) = vbYes Then
         With StudentsRS  ' Students joined to Persons
           .FindFirst "STID = " & tempSTID2
           If Not .NoMatch Then ' found it
            On Error Resume Next ' if student or person used elsewhere get error
            .Delete
            If Err.Number > 0 Then
              Err.Clear
              MsgBox "Can Not Delete - Used Elsewhere"
            Else
              Call ScifairLog("Del Proto 2nd Student STID: ", tempSTID, tempLN2 & ", " & tempFN2)
            End If
            On Error GoTo 0
            On Error GoTo SubError
          End If
        End With
      End If
    End If
  End If
  If tempSTID3 > 0 Then  ' check if delete 3rd student
    If tempTP3 = "PS" Then  ' Never Delete Students with TP = ES From prev years
            ' Also Never Delete if have other types in TP field i.e 'PS,AD'
      If MsgBox("Delete Protocol 3rd Student  " & tempLN3 & ", " & tempFN3 & vbCrLf & _
                "   (From Protocol you just Deleted", _
         vbYesNo) = vbYes Then
         With StudentsRS  ' Students joined to Persons
           .FindFirst "STID = " & tempSTID3
           If Not .NoMatch Then ' found it
            On Error Resume Next ' if student or person used elsewhere get error
            .Delete  ' Delete the student and the person if possible
            If Err.Number > 0 Then
              Err.Clear
              MsgBox "Can Not Delete - Used Elsewhere"
            Else
              Call ScifairLog("Del Proto 3rd Student STID: ", tempSTID3, tempLN3 & ", " & tempFN3)
            End If
            On Error GoTo 0
            On Error GoTo SubError
          End If
        End With
      End If
    End If
  End If
  ' Update the student select comboboxes
  Me.cbStudent.Requery
  Me.cbStudent2.Requery
  Me.cbStudent3.Requery
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub

Private Sub Form_AfterUpdate()
   On Error GoTo SubError
   Me.cbFindStudent.Requery
   If Me.STATUS = "NEW" Then
     If IIf(IsNull(Me.TSch_Code), "", Me.TSch_Code) _
      <> IIf(IsNull(Me.SCH_CODE), "", Me.SCH_CODE) Then
      msg = "Teacher's Previous School is DIFFERENT!" & vbCrLf & vbCrLf & _
            "UPDATE? (ONLY WITH STAFF APPROVAL!) "
       If MsgBox(msg, vbYesNo + vbDefaultButton2, Title) = vbYes Then
          Me.TTemp = "PrvSC=" & Me.TSch_Code ' save in case changed
          Me.TSch_Code = Me.SCH_CODE
       End If
     End If
   End If
   Exit Sub
SubError:
   MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub Form_BeforeDelConfirm(Cancel As Integer, Response As Integer)
   ' do not display the confirmation, did in on delete
   Response = acDataErrContinue
   End Sub
Private Sub Form_Close()
   Me.Application.SetOption "Confirm Record Changes", HoldCRCState
End Sub
Private Sub Form_Current()  'each time a new record is sellected
   On Error GoTo SubError
   If Me.NewRecord Or IsNull(Me.PROTOID) Then
      cbStudent.Locked = False ' Allow new student entry
      Me.tbRecord = 1 + Me.Recordset.RecordCount
      Me.tbNumRec = 1 + Me.Recordset.RecordCount
      DidAdd = True
   Else
      Me.cbFindStudent.Requery
      Me.tbNumRec = Me.Recordset.RecordCount
      Me.tbRecord = Me.CurrentRecord
      cbStudent.Locked = True
   End If
   Exit Sub
SubError:
   MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub Form_Delete(Cancel As Integer)
   On Error GoTo SubError
   msg = "DELETE RECORD?"
   If MsgBox(msg, vbYesNo + vbDefaultButton2, Title) = vbNo Then
      Cancel = True
      Exit Sub
   End If
   tempPCID = Me.PROTOID  ' will always be set if arrive here
   tempSTID = Me.STID
   tempTP = IIf(IsNull(Me.TP), "", Me.TP)
   tempLN = IIf(IsNull(Me.SLN), "", Me.SLN)
   tempFN = IIf(IsNull(Me.SFN), "", Me.SFN)
   tempSTID2 = IIf(IsNull(Me.STID2), 0, Me.STID2)
   tempTP2 = IIf(IsNull(Me.TP2), "", Me.TP2)
   tempLN2 = IIf(IsNull(Me.S2LN), "", Me.S2LN)
   tempFN2 = IIf(IsNull(Me.S2FN), "", Me.S2FN)
   tempSTID3 = IIf(IsNull(Me.STID3), 0, Me.STID3)
   tempTP3 = IIf(IsNull(Me.TP3), "", Me.TP3)
   tempLN3 = IIf(IsNull(Me.S3LN), "", Me.S3LN)
   tempFN3 = IIf(IsNull(Me.S3FN), "", Me.S3FN)
   DidDelete = True
   Exit Sub
SubError:
   MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub Form_Load()
   DidAdd = False
   DidDelete = False
   Me.Rev.Caption = RevisionDate
End Sub
Private Sub Form_Open(Cancel As Integer)
  ' Open the Students , Teachers and Persons Tables
  On Error GoTo SubError
  Title = "Protocols"
  HoldCRCState = Me.Application.GetOption("Confirm Record Changes")
  Me.Application.SetOption "Confirm Record Changes", True
  Set dbSciFair = CurrentDb()
  ' The next statements give a type mismatch error unless or until
  ' I fixed the priority of references in the Visual Basic Tools option.
  ' Sequence must be:
  ' Visual Basic for Applications
  ' Microsoft Access 9.0 Library
  ' Microsoft Office 9.0 Library
  ' OLE Automation
  ' Microsoft DAO 3.6 Obj Lib
  ' Microsoft Visual Basic of Application Extensibility 5.3
  '  Others as needed
  '
  criteria = "SELECT Teachers.TID, Teachers.SCH_CODE, " & _
     "Teachers.Temp, Teachers.Type, Teachers.PID, Persons.LAST_CHG, " & _
     "Persons.SALUTATION, Persons.TP, Persons.FNAME, " & _
     "Persons.MI, Persons.LNAME FROM Persons " & _
     "RIGHT JOIN Teachers ON Persons.PID = Teachers.PID " & _
     "ORDER BY LNAME, FNAME, MI;"
  Set TeachersRS = dbSciFair.OpenRecordset(criteria, dbOpenDynaset)
  criteria = "SELECT Students.STID, Students.LAST_FAIR, Students.SEX, Students.GRADE, " & _
     "Students.S_SCH, Students.Temp, Persons.LNAME, Persons.FNAME, " & _
     "Persons.MI, Persons.SALUTATION, Students.S_TID, Persons.LAST_CHG, " & _
     "Persons.TP, Students.PID " & _
     "FROM Persons RIGHT JOIN Students ON Persons.PID = Students.PID " & _
     "ORDER BY Persons.LNAME, Persons.FNAME, Persons.MI, Persons.SALUTATION;"
  Set StudentsRS = dbSciFair.OpenRecordset(criteria, dbOpenDynaset)
  Set ProtocolFormsRS = dbSciFair.OpenRecordset("ProtocolForms", dbOpenDynaset)
  Exit Sub
SubError:
   MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub

Private Sub Form_Timer()
   On Error GoTo SubError
   Me.TimerInterval = 0
   SendKeys "{TAB}"
   Exit Sub
SubError:
   MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub

Private Sub Form_Unload(Cancel As Integer)
   On Error GoTo SubError
   Me.Recordset.MoveFirst
   Me.Recordset.FindFirst ("[STATUS] = 'NEW'")
   If Not Me.Recordset.NoMatch Then
      msg = "You Did Not Print All Protocol Forms!" & vbCrLf & _
            "You Must Print each where STATUS = 'NEW'" & vbCrLf & _
            "EXIT WITHOUT PRINTING?"
      If MsgBox(msg, vbYesNo + vbDefaultButton2, Title) = vbNo Then
        Cancel = True
        Exit Sub
      End If
   End If
   Me.Recordset.MoveFirst
   ' Find any Letter Type entry without a date of letter sent
   ' Date is set (as well as new status) when Letter is printed
   Me.Recordset.FindFirst ("[LTRDATE] Is Null AND [LTRSENT] is NOT Null")
   If Not Me.Recordset.NoMatch Then
      msg = "You Did Not Print All Letters!" & vbCrLf & _
            "You Must Print If Letter indicated & Letter Date = Blank" & vbCrLf & _
            "EXIT WITHOUT PRINTING?"
      If MsgBox(msg, vbYesNo + vbDefaultButton2, Title) = vbNo Then
        Cancel = True
        Exit Sub
      End If
   End If
   TeachersRS.Close
   StudentsRS.Close
   Exit Sub
SubError:
   MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub THomePh_Enter()
  If IsNull(Me.THomePh) Then
    Me.THomePh.Locked = False
  Else
    Me.THomePh.Locked = True
  End If
End Sub
Private Sub TType_Exit(Cancel As Integer)
  On Error GoTo SubError
  If StrComp(TType, UCase(TType), 0) <> 0 Then ' Binary compare
      TType = UCase(TType)        ' do only if not already ucase
  End If
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub btnUndo_Click()
On Error GoTo Err_btnUndo_Click
    DoCmd.DoMenuItem acFormBar, acEditMenu, acUndo, , acMenuVer70
Exit_btnUndo_Click:
    Exit Sub
Err_btnUndo_Click:
    MsgBox Err.Description
    Resume Exit_btnUndo_Click
End Sub
Private Sub btnSave_MouseDown(Button As Integer, Shift As Integer, x As Single, Y As Single)
  On Error GoTo SubError
  Set ctlPrevFocus = Screen.PreviousControl
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub btnSave_Click()
    Dim svPROTOID As Long
    On Error GoTo Err_btnSave_Click
    DoCmd.DoMenuItem acFormBar, acRecordsMenu, acSaveRecord, , acMenuVer70
    svPROTOID = Me.PROTOID
    ' The next command does a Remove Filter Sort which in effect requeries
    DoCmd.DoMenuItem acFormBar, acRecordsMenu, 3, , acMenuVer70 'RemFiltSort
    Me.Recordset.FindFirst "PROTOID = " & svPROTOID '
    ctlPrevFocus.SetFocus
Exit_btnSave_Click:
    Exit Sub
Err_btnSave_Click:
    MsgBox Err.Description
    Resume Exit_btnSave_Click
End Sub
Private Sub btnFirst_MouseDown(Button As Integer, Shift As Integer, x As Single, Y As Single)
  On Error GoTo SubError
  Set ctlPrevFocus = Screen.PreviousControl
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub btnFirst_Click()
On Error GoTo Err_btnFirst_Click
    DoCmd.GoToRecord , , acFirst
    ctlPrevFocus.SetFocus
Exit_btnFirst_Click:
    Exit Sub
Err_btnFirst_Click:
    MsgBox Err.Description
    Resume Exit_btnFirst_Click
End Sub
Private Sub btnPrev_MouseDown(Button As Integer, Shift As Integer, x As Single, Y As Single)
  On Error GoTo SubError
  Set ctlPrevFocus = Screen.PreviousControl
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub btnPrev_Click()
On Error GoTo Err_btnPrev_Click
    DoCmd.GoToRecord , , acPrevious
    ctlPrevFocus.SetFocus
Exit_btnPrev_Click:
    Exit Sub
Err_btnPrev_Click:
    MsgBox Err.Description
    Resume Exit_btnPrev_Click
End Sub
Private Sub btnNext_MouseDown(Button As Integer, Shift As Integer, x As Single, Y As Single)
  On Error GoTo SubError
  Set ctlPrevFocus = Screen.PreviousControl
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub btnNext_Click()
On Error GoTo Err_btnNext_Click
    If Me.CurrentRecord = Me.Recordset.RecordCount Then
       MsgBox "End of Data!"
       ctlPrevFocus.SetFocus
       Exit Sub
    End If
    DoCmd.GoToRecord , , acNext
    ctlPrevFocus.SetFocus
Exit_btnNext_Click:
    Exit Sub
Err_btnNext_Click:
    MsgBox Err.Description
    Resume Exit_btnNext_Click
End Sub
Private Sub btnLast_MouseDown(Button As Integer, Shift As Integer, x As Single, Y As Single)
  On Error GoTo SubError
  Set ctlPrevFocus = Screen.PreviousControl
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub btnLast_Click()
On Error GoTo Err_btnLast_Click
    DoCmd.GoToRecord , , acLast
    ctlPrevFocus.SetFocus
Exit_btnLast_Click:
    Exit Sub
Err_btnLast_Click:
    MsgBox Err.Description
    Resume Exit_btnLast_Click
End Sub
Private Sub btnDelete_MouseDown(Button As Integer, Shift As Integer, x As Single, Y As Single)
  On Error GoTo SubError
  Set ctlPrevFocus = Screen.PreviousControl
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub btnDelete_Click()
On Error GoTo Err_btnDelete_Click
      DoCmd.DoMenuItem acFormBar, acEditMenu, 8, , acMenuVer70
      DoCmd.DoMenuItem acFormBar, acEditMenu, 6, , acMenuVer70
      ctlPrevFocus.SetFocus
Exit_btnDelete_Click:
    Exit Sub
Err_btnDelete_Click:
    MsgBox Err.Description
    Resume Exit_btnDelete_Click
End Sub
